verses.verse: Then <S%H7725>again<s%> I lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw,<s%> and <S%H5774>behold,<s%> a flying <S%H4039>scroll.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7200>me,<s%> "What do you see?" I <S%H559>answered,<s%> "I <S%H7200>see<s%> a <S%H5774>flying<s%> <S%H4039>scroll;<s%> its <S%H753>length<s%> is <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and its <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>"

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H423>me,<s%> "This is the curse that goes <S%H3318>out<s%> over the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the whole <S%H776>land;<s%> for everyone who <S%H1589>steals<s%> shall be cut <S%H5352>off<s%> <S%H3644>according<s%> to it on the one <S%H7650>side;<s%> and everyone who swears falsely shall be cut <S%H5352>off<s%> according to it on the other <S%H3644>side.<s%>

I will cause it to go <S%H3318>out,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> "and it will <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H1590>thief,<s%> and into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of him who <S%H7650>swears<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%> by my <S%H8034>name;<s%> and it will <S%H3885>remain<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and will <S%H3615>destroy<s%> it with its <S%H6086>timber<s%> and its <S%H68>stones.<s%>"

Then the <S%H4397>angel<s%> who <S%H1696>talked<s%> with me came <S%H3318>forward,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5375>me,<s%> "Lift up now your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> what is this that is <S%H3318>appearing.<s%>"

I <S%H559>said,<s%> "What is <S%H559>it?<s%>" He said, "This is the <S%H374>ephah<s%> basket that is <S%H559>appearing.<s%>" He said <S%H5869>moreover,<s%> "This is their appearance in all the <S%H776>land<s%>

(and <S%H3603>behold,<s%> a talent of <S%H5777>lead<s%> was lifted <S%H5375>up<s%>); and this is <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H3427>sitting<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the ephah <S%H374>basket.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "This is <S%H7564>Wickedness;<s%>" and he <S%H7993>threw<s%> her down into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H374>ephah<s%> <S%H7993>basket;<s%> and he threw the <S%H68>weight<s%> of <S%H5777>lead<s%> on its <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

Then lifted I <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw,<s%> and <S%H3318>behold,<s%> there were <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H802>women,<s%> and the <S%H7307>wind<s%> was in their <S%H3671>wings.<s%> Now they <S%H2007>had<s%> <S%H3671>wings<s%> like the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of a <S%H2624>stork,<s%> and they lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H374>ephah<s%> basket between <S%H776>earth<s%> and the <S%H8064>sky.<s%>
Then I <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4397>angel<s%> who <S%H1696>talked<s%> with <S%H3212>me,<s%> "Where are these carrying the ephah <S%H374>basket?<s%>"

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1129>me,<s%> "To build her a <S%H1004>house<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8152>Shinar.<s%> When it is <S%H3559>prepared,<s%> she will be <S%H3240>set<s%> there in her own <S%H4369>place.<s%>"
